TypeSignature.Value: public class MarshalByValueComponent : IDisposable, IServiceProvider, System.ComponentModel.IComponent
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MarshalByValueComponent extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider

Docs.summary: Implements and provides the base implementation for remotable components that are marshaled by value (a copy of the serialized object is passed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A component can be contained in a container. For each component in a container, the container creates a site that it uses to manage the component. The component interacts with its container primarily through a container-provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>, which is a repository of container-specific, per-component information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A component can be contained in a container. For each component in a container, the container creates a site that it uses to manage the component. The component interacts with its container primarily through a container-provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>, which is a repository of container-specific, per-component information.

Docs.summary: Gets the container for the component.
Docs.value: An object implementing the interface that represents the component's container, or if the component does not have a site.
Docs.returns: An object implementing the interface that represents the component's container, or if the component does not have a site.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the component is currently in design mode.
Docs.value: if the component is in design mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the component does not have a site, this method always returns `false`.

Docs.returns: if the component is in design mode; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>. The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> in an unusable state. After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> was occupying. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](../Topic/Cleaning%20Up%20Unmanaged%20Resources.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](../Topic/Implementing%20a%20Dispose%20Method.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>. Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method. `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> references. This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

Docs.summary: Adds an event handler to listen to the Disposed event on the component.
Gets the list of event handlers that are attached to this component.
Docs.value: An that provides the delegates for this component.
Docs.returns: An that provides the delegates for this component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of service you want.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the implementer of the <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information on designer services you can use, see [Design-Time Architecture](../Topic/Design-Time%20Architecture.md).

Docs.value: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the implementer of the <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.ComponentModel.ISite Site { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the site of the component.
Docs.value: An object implementing the interface that represents the site of the component.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A valid value for this property - that is, the value is not `null`, indicates that the component has been added to a container.
When the value of this property is `null`, the property indicates that the component is being removed from a container. However, this property does not remove the component from the container.

Docs.returns: An object implementing the interface that represents the site of the component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the , if any. This method should not be overridden.
Docs.returns:
A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the , if any.
if the is unnamed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> may or may not have a name. If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name is unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>'s name. A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> can only have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.

Docs.value:
A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the , if any.
if the is unnamed.
